title: #165: America’s Disgusting Political Orgy | Quite Frankly
description:
The host of the nightly show “Quite Frankly” stops by to break down what is happening to America while the mainstream media and government agencies lie to the public with impunity.

Has America been tricked into accepting a fraudulent grifter into the White House, and who does Joe Biden actually work for? His relationships with companies in China, his admission of threatening judges in Ukraine while VP, and his son’s reckless and arrogant foray into governmental grifting have put his administration in a dangerous predicament.

Luckily Frank is here to explain how it all works and why these people should be run out of polite society as quickly as possible.
